config.title: Potion Cauldron Configuration
config.notice.tooltip: Changing this config will only affect local worlds.
config.text.allowMergingPotions: Allow merging different types of the same potion
config.text.evaporatePotionWhenMixed: Evaporate if different potions or liquids are mixed
config.text.applyPotionEffectsToEntities: Apply potion effects to entities inside
config.text.allowFillingWithWaterDrips: Allow filling with water drips from rain and dripstone
